1.title: Holiday Bizarre #3
1.plot: It's holiday time at Obscura Antiques & Oddities so Mike, Evan & Ryan hold a festive show & tell dinner party for their quirkiest customers including Robot Mike, Laura Flook & Andy Animal. But first an evil clown jams some metal into his face and back.

2.title: Brain Bits & Baby Gifts
2.plot: At Obscura, Laura Flook shows how shopping for a baby can be like pulling teeth. Then, a painter looks to trade Ryan his elongated skull for something more mesmerizing, and a doctor diagnoses one of Mike & Evan's most mysterious items.

3.title: Evan's Odd Anniversary
3.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities, Evan goes through x-rays & ear abuse before settling on the perfect anniversary gift for her husband Johnny. Then the bad nurse is back seeking another eye-gouging gag, and a mentalist gets into Ryan & Mike's heads.

5.title: No Guts, No Gory
5.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities, Mike & Ryan have a bloody good time tracking down pieces for a Jack the Ripper themed haunted house. Then a customer sells Mike a mysterious specimen that's more gooey than hooey, and Evan trades for twisted twins.

6.title: Head Shrinking 101 with Ryan
6.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities Ryan cooks up an alternative recipe to make a shrunken head replica. Then Mike gets the shock of a lifetime when he sticks his pencil where it doesn't belong, and a couple tries to sell Evan an antique skin grafter.

7.title: Tongue Tied
7.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities a customer tries to sell a baby he found while dumpster diving & a wrestler wants something to intimidate his opponents with, so Mike goes on the hunt and finds an item so disturbing it leaves his customer tongue tied.

8.title: New Oddleans
8.plot: The Obscura Antiques & Oddities gang heads to the Big Easy where Evan meets the bassist for White Zombie & a puppet group rumored to do human sacrifice. Then Ryan & Mike meet zombies of their own, leading them to a spirit whisperer & ancient sarcophagus.

9.title: Don't Get Testis
9.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities a pro wrestler gets the shock of his life and Ryan brokers a deal with a competitor to get a vintage hair removal apparatus. Later, Mike & Evan go nuts hunting for the ultimate symbol of masculinity to please a customer.

10.title: Jails, Fails, and Salem Tales
10.plot: Ryan's friend arrives to sell a mysterious organ he cannot name. Then Mike and Evan head to one of the largest flea markets in the US when a customer hires them to decorate his converted old jail house in Salem, Massachusetts.

14.title: Skeletons and Gwar
14.plot: Mike encounters a singing siren hunting for something of the sea variety and Ryan takes on a huge challenge, articulating a full-size skeleton. Then a surprise visit by Gwar may lead to a purchase of a one eyed creature.

15.title: Music to My Gears
15.plot: A customer asks Mike and Evan to breathe life into his creepy 100 year old automaton and Ryan meets an artist needing disgusting props. Later a man who chased Mike with a chainsaw reappears and wants something from him and Ryan.

1.title: Mummy Cat
1.plot: In Obscura Antiques & Oddities a collector offers a mummified cat for sale, but is it valuable? Or just putrefying remains? Also: A playwright with a passion for straitjackets visits, while a seller brings in musket balls, only to discover their true origin is much stranger.

2.title: The Model Mortician
2.plot: In Obscura Antiques & Oddities a model turned mortician makes a bizarre request to display her newest fashion line, and a shopper makes a purchase that tests Mike's gag reflex. Ersan thinks he purchased fossil dinosaur feces, but the owners don't buy it.

3.title: Spider Prank
3.plot: At Obscura, Ryan is on the hunt for a high-end monkey skull to satisfy a picky new customer. Evan attempts to help a customer find the perfect item to prank his girlfriend. Mike takes a big chance on an ancient medical concoction.

4.title: Skull Envy
4.plot: Ryan - passionate about the study of bones - tries to create an "exploded" (or Beauchene) skull, Evan meets a puppeteer in search of a prosthetic limb, and a customer has what appears to be a body in the trunk of his car.

5.title: Mummified Hand
5.plot: At Obscura a customer tries to sell what he believes is an ancient Egyptian artifact, but is it really a fake? Then one customer brings in some of her "unique" artwork made from human nails and a customer brings in a medical bag that Mike can't wait to dig through.

6.title: Four-Legged Chicken
6.plot: In Obscura Antiques & Oddities, Mike and Ryan bet a client they can find a rare taxidermy piece: the elusive sloth. A seller brings a Victorian medical device that sparks fear in Cerd, and a pain artist wants Obscura's bloodletting kit to use on himself.

7.title: Pickled Pig
7.plot: Ryan and Mike hunt for a vintage human skeleton to satisfy a rocker; a seller stops by Obscura with a failed Valentine's present, a pickled pig; and Evan tries out an old electro-shock therapy machine on herself to see if it works (it does).

8.title: Teeth on a Stick
8.plot: Evan takes the challenge of finding the perfect gift for a customer's dentist, but after he questions her pick of a rare dental display, she finds that the hunt is going to be tougher than she anticipated. Later, the world's smallest escape artist has his eye on a coffin and hopes to get a discount if he gives the Obscura team a show. Finally, Mike and Evan get a lead on a huge collection of medical oddities from around the world, but after a long ride they find the owner may be more interested in show-and-tell than a sell.

9.title: The Chair
9.plot: A very particular collector stops by the shop with a sizzling request, sending Mike and Evan off on the hunt. The Cerd goes head-over-heels for a seller's two-bodied duck, but a doubtful Evan steps in for a closer look. Then, two magicians reveal the mysterious workings of a trick when they ask Ryan to create a very special piece of taxidermy for their show

10.title: The Bulb Cruncher
10.plot: In Obscura Antiques & Oddities a seller brings a book to Obscura that she thinks is bound in human skin but Mike decides to have it DNA tested to see if it's real. An intriguing buyer offers to perform a cutting edge stunt with a light bulb for a discount

1.title: Shrunken Head
1.plot: A seller stops by with what he says is an authentic shrunken human head. An orchestral black metal composer looks to the dark side for inspiration. Mike and Evan hear sweet music when performance artist Genesis offers to sell human thigh bone trumpets.

2.title: Raising the Dead
2.plot: At Obscura Antiques and Oddities, shop regular Laura stumbles upon a mysterious tonic made with real testicles. Meanwhile Ryan is challenged to create something incredible with 2 dead pets, and later a man offers to sell an ear still connected to a skull.

3.title: 3 Little Piggies
3.plot: When a seller brings in 3 deformed pigs to Obscura Antiques and Oddities Mike thinks he has the perfect home for them. Evan sells a rare piece of Victorian hair art to a kindred spirit, and an artist who paints in his own blood gives a tour of his studio.

4.title: Rock Star Embalmer
4.plot: At Obscura Antiques and Oddities, Jonathan Davis of Korn sends Mike and Evan on a hunt for vintage embalming equipment. A customer tries to sell a giant automaton clown, and later a buyer shows Mike her amazing lizard like qualities for a discount.

5.title: Romancing the Bone
5.plot: At Obscura Antiques and Oddities Edgar gets spooked by a lamp that looks alive, and a seller tries to peddle teddy bears made of a strange product inspired by the body. Ryan finds romance when he meets a pretty bone collector and her articulated rooster.

6.title: Edison's Monstrous Creation
6.plot: At Obscura Antiques and Oddities a seller brings in a terrifying item with huge fangs, and Mike and Evan hunt for a shocking quack medial device. Later, Mike takes a chance on buying a creepy talking item created by Thomas Edison over 100 years ago.

7.title: The Horaffe
7.plot: An artist endeavors to steal dust from Obscura Antiques and Oddities, then sell it back to the shop. Later, Mike is challenged to create a massive piece of taxidermy, and an amazingly flexible grandmother contorts her body for a deal on a stuffed feline.

8.title: Piece of Mind
8.plot: At Obscura Antiques and Oddities, a dashing artist finds a very peculiar corrective device. Then Mike and Evan hunt for a bizarre medical specimen for a photo shoot, and an impalement artist shows his skill when he buys a throwing knife owned by Houdini.

9.title: Hedgehog Homolog
9.plot: At Obscura Antiques and Oddities an artist scours the shop for an item she can really sink her teeth into. Later a customer wants to strike a deal for a Coney Island relic but Mike and Evan take a stand, and a shopper falls in love with a 2-faced kitty.

10.title: Love Stones
10.plot: At Obscura Antiques and Oddities Mike's wife recruits Evan and Ryan to locate the perfect birthday gift for Mike. Later Mike has an eye-popping surprise when he finds a plasticized human organ, and actress Chloe Sevigny springs for a lewd old time gag.

1.title: The Smoking Lung
1.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities, sparks fly when Mike and Evan meet an evil clown and his power grinder. Ryan opens an old wound with Mike when he falls in love with the shop's new piece of freak taxidermy. Then, a customer is left holding a smoking lung.

2.title: Shot Through the Heart
2.plot: A patron tries selling 3 pickled hearts, but 1 may have a sinister past. Later Evan's friend Jonathan attempts hypnotizing her for a good deal, and a customer trades a peculiar item that has been traumatizing his daughter.

3.title: Fingernails & Just for Males
3.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities a horned patron looks to rid himself of a possessed dummy. Ryan must create a new preparation of exploded skull but finds the process really stinks, and a woman with 18 inch fingernails bonds with Evan over the prostate.

4.title: Ghost Rider
4.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities, a new customer finds himself trying to escape from a rare set of handcuffs and Mike & Ryan scramble to find the skeleton of a little racecar driver. Later a mother invests in a very hairy piece of shop real estate.

5.title: Members Only
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Mummy's Private Collection
6.plot: A customer brings in what appears to be an unexpected appendage from a Mummy. Then, a customer gets a crack to the skull when he tries out restraints made for a child, and a man stares Ryan down with a one eyed pig.

7.title: Insane & The Membrane
7.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities a customer receives a 2-for-1 deal on a pickled pooch. Then Mike and Evan find a rare helmet designed to cure the insane. Later there's a jaw dropping experience with a human head, and a deer arrives that's nearly invisible.

8.title: Sorceress of Love
8.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities, a boy wants to sell his hamster but it's not what Mike & Evan were expecting. Then, Ryan and Monique get wrapped up in their second date & this time they consult a sorceress. Later, Mike & Evan brace for Adventure.

9.title: Arsenic Avenger
9.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities, Mike and Evan lend a hand to legendary Toxic Avenger director, Lloyd Kaufman. Later a chainsaw wielding performer flips out on the team, and a customer reveals a taboo piercing kit that isn't used to put holes in ears.

10.title: Black Magic Woman
10.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities Mike considers buying a bizarre baboon that begs, and a customer is looking to unload a terrifying cauldron used in the practice of black magic. Then, Ryan feels the heat when a performer nearly lights the shop on fire.

11.title: Holly-Odd
11.plot: On a trip to LA, Mike, Evan, and Ryan uncover the weird side of that city. Ryan meets with Dita Von Teese to look for a piece of bird taxidermy. Mike and Evan visit the world's fastest talking man, a bunny museum, and the Institute of Abnormal Art.

12.title: Edgar
12.plot: Edgar comes in looking to purchase a 'mad scientist' looking setup for the new apartment he just moved into. Susan comes in with a unique newborn and an eccentric customer is looking to buy 'body parts'

13.title: Holiday Bizarre
13.plot: At Obscura, Mike & Ryan conspire with Evan's husband Johnny and a wax working artist to bring a surprise twist to their Holiday Solstice party. Then a tattoo fan needs a scary Secret Santa gift and Evan gets tongue tied by an Evil Santa.

14.title: Heads or Fails
14.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities a woman brings in bizarre jewelry made from some not so precious stones. Mike & Evan shop the markets for a mummified body part, and a horror producer finds a mask made to stop her from eating her own hair.

15.title: Peruvian Skull
15.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

16.title: A Guerney for Grandpa
16.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities a woman hires Mike & Evan to find vintage autopsy equipment to use with her grandfather's body. Then Ryan sends shivers down a dark lord's spine when he suggests a creepy item, and a human pincushion shows his holey side.

17.title: Meat Mastodon
17.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities Mike & Evan deliver fresh eyeballs to a woman who creates art from animal tongues. Evan gets dressed up for a big steampunk party, Mike gets a set of vampire fangs and they get a visit from Brent of the band Mastodon.

18.title: Killer Queen
18.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities, an artist flips for Evan's look and wants to create a life sized wax model of her. Then, Ryan calls an expert to figure out what a torturous looking item really is and Mike gets a very disturbing look at life as a sailor.

19.title: Keeping Austin Odd
19.plot: Obscura Antiques & Oddities heads to Texas when an astronaut sends Mike and Evan on a mission to keep his Austin home weird. The challenge puts the two in contact with a mummy, a man who lifts incredible weights and an unpredictable Black Scorpion.

20.title: Mounting Tensions
20.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities tensions mount as Ryan and Mike compete head-to-head in an annual taxidermy contest. Then, Judah Friedlander stops by and finds his calling with Mike & Evan. Later, a huge customer starts ripping things apart in the store.

21.title: Best of Oddities
21.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities, Mike & Evan take a look back at the best moments from Oddities. They recall the most amazing items they've ever come across, the incredible customers that bring them in & the freakiest sideshow performances!

22.title: The Power of a Grey Skull
22.plot: Evan and Ryan must locate a body modification item for a tattoo shop. Then Mike and Evan get drilled by a blockhead looking for a new piece for his act, and a traveling museum finds a WWII parachute that didn't drop troops.

23.title: Holiday Bizarre: Part 2
23.plot: At Obscura, Mike & Ryan conspire with Evan's husband Johnny and a wax working artist to bring a surprise twist to their Holiday Solstice party. Then a tattoo fan needs a scary Secret Santa gift and Evan gets tongue tied by an Evil Santa.

24.title: Best of #2
24.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities, Mike & Evan take a look back at the best moments from Oddities. They recall the most amazing items they've ever come across, the incredible customers that bring them in & the freakiest sideshow performances.

1.title: Return to Holly-Odd
1.plot: On a trip to LA, Mike, Evan, and Ryan uncover the weird side of that city. Ryan meets with Dita Von Teese to look for a piece of bird taxidermy. Mike and Evan visit the world's fastest talking man, a bunny museum, and the Institute of Abnormal Art.

2.title: Mutant Mascot
2.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities, Mike, Evan & Ryan race to find a new shop centerpiece weird enough to celebrate their new space. Then Andy Animal peddles psychedelic medicine and the DarkLord returns with a reanimating baby of a thousand nightmares.

3.title: Dummy Drama & Internal Trauma
3.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities a collector hires Evan & Ryan to outdo the titanium rods he keeps from his deceased mother's spine. Then an urban explorer convinces Mike he's no dummy & a customer touts a therapy device that's more shocking than expected.

5.title: Taking Life by the Ears, Nose & Throat
5.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities an urban elf seeks a ouija board for her celluloid séance. Then Mike & Evan try to obtain an ear, nose & throat for a doctor who saved their customer's life, and Ryan learns why you don't stick your tongue out at strangers.

6.title: Skull Camera Obscura
6.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities Andy Animal pitches Ryan a porcelain flower vase that doesn't smell like roses. Then a photographer wants to shoot Mike & Evan with an ancient skull-camera hybrid and Mike is thrown a huge bone courtesy of the Jersey shore.

7.title: Blood Suckers & Brain Eaters
7.plot: At Obscura lizards run wild when a reptile specialist adopts a new pet. Then Mike & Evan are hired by a TV producer to breathe life into the undead for his zombie hunter series and a customer gets a token for his friend's parasite of an ex-wife.

8.title: March of the Pangolin
8.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities bar and taxidermy owner Nic hires Mike & Evan to find him a unique stuffed animal. Then a patron goes nuts after realizing he did not grab the bull by its horns, and a customer catches Ryan's ear while playing with saws.

9.title: A Bug's Afterlife
9.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities Mike bugs out seeking the ultimate insect for a customer's diorama project. Then Evan & Ryan pitch a TV host items that'll leave his audience cringing with glee & Ryan gives a steampunk captain a window to nether regions.

10.title: Slim Goodbody's Anatomical Adventure
10.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities, anatomical blast from the past Slim Goodbody enlists Mike & Evan to find him an awesome educational prop. Then eyes pop when a customer seeks ocular inspiration, and Ryan braces for trouble as he meets a village idiot.

12.title: Heads, Kegels, Knees & Toes
12.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities, gangrene attacks when a customer hires Mike & Evan to find something stranger than his scars. Then, a walking monster sees what it's like to be scared to death. Ann exercises another dose of quack medicine.

13.title: The Mummy Phallus Returns
13.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities, a patron who tried selling a fake mummy phallus returns claiming now he has the real thing. A customer discovers her 9-banded armadillo is missing some bands. Ryan is confronted with a test of strength.

14.title: Skull in the City & A Two-Headed Kitty
14.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities Ryan's artistic protégé seeks the biggest skull he can find. Then Mike & Evan brace for the end of the world when a customer forces them to break out emergency supplies and another proves that a two-headed cat is real.

15.title: Vampires of Phila'hell'phia
15.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities Laura gets the shop scouring Philadelphia to decorate her vampire themed party. Then Mike & Evan meet a strange ventriloquist, a coffin dealing couple & experience what it was like to sit on Al Capone's porcelain throne.

16.title: Bat Man & Ryan
16.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities a quirky couple with a jaded collecting appetite hires Mike to recover something so rare it's extinct. Then Evan & Ryan join a real life batman's wildlife preservation fight, and Evan gets a dose of therapy from a microwave.

17.title: Obscura Is Loved to Death
17.plot: At Obscura, Mike encounters a customer who loves blowing his own horn and Evan gets a little heartburn in the shop with Dr. Dave. Meanwhile, Audra & Wednesday of Loved to Death stop by to get help finding an Egyptian item for a client.

18.title: Lights, Camera, Duck Impaction!
18.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities, Mike & Evan take a hack at finding a horror prop for renowned B-movie producer Lloyd Kaufman. Then an Aussie buys a gift from six feet down under, and an exterminator tries to unload something from an infested funeral home.

19.title: Evan's Odd Anniversary
19.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

-1.title: Seeing Scars
-1.plot: At Obscura Antiques & Oddities, a dancer has Mike and Evan seeing scars when she asks them to find a very special item. Then, Evan tests out a rare glass mortician table & Ryan finds his inner Buddha when he hears the sweet sound of a human skull drum.

imdb.plot outline: Oddities dives into the world of weird. Extraordinary science artifacts can be found in New York's Obscura Antiques & Oddities. No item or story is too peculiar for the shops owners, Mike and Evan, nor are any lengths too great to get what they are after. From human bones to taxidermy pieces, the duo will hit the road to obtain whatever it is their client demands. In every episode, Mike and Evan employ their intuition and expertise to identify what's the real deal, and what shouldn't make the cut. No matter the odds, they always deliver.
imdb.title: Oddities
plot: New York City's Obscura Antiques & _Oddities_ (qv) ain't your grandmother's antique shop unless your grandmother is an eccentric. _Oddities_ (qv) follows this unique store as it deals in the strange and the bizarre, item-wise and client-wise.::_Oddities_ (qv)

_Oddities_ (qv) dives into the world of weird. Extraordinary science artifacts can be found in New York's Obscura Antiques & _Oddities_ (qv). No item or story is too peculiar for the shops owners, Mike and Evan, nor are any lengths too great to get what they are after. From human bones to taxidermy pieces, the duo will hit the road to obtain whatever it is their client demands. In every episode, Mike and Evan employ their intuition and expertise to identify what's the real deal, and what shouldn't make the cut. No matter the odds, they always deliver.
synopsis: Where can you go when you're in dire need of a used strait jacket? What if you just have to have a two-headed cat or a book bound with human flesh to make your living room complete? There's only one emporium sublimely weird enough to carry these bizarre items and countless more - Obscura Antiques and Oddities in New York's East Village. Science Channel's breakout series, ODDITIES, follows Obscura's proprietors, Mike and Evan, as well as an assortment of hilariously-unique patrons who are even more outlandish than the merchandise.Obscura is renowned for having some of the rarest and most-eccentric antique pieces found anywhere - from circus sideshow props, to shocking natural anomalies, to oddball items dabbling in the occult. Aficionados of the unusual from throughout the U.S. and beyond know that Obscura is the only place to purchase their next treasure - or sell their own abnormal assets. Mike, Evan and consultant Ryan serve as the ringmasters for this one-of-a-kind experience that's part swap meet and part cult rally.
